LanguageData.Mining_Disapproved.label: disapproved
LanguageData.Mining_Disapproved.description: Mining into the natural earth is an ugly act.
LanguageData.Mining_Horrible.label: horrible
LanguageData.Mining_Horrible.description: Violating the natural earth with mining tools is a horrible act.
LanguageData.Mining_Prohibited.label: prohibited
LanguageData.Mining_Prohibited.description: Raping the natural earth with mining tools is a horrifically evil act.
LanguageData.MiningYield_High.label: high
LanguageData.MiningYield_High.description: Mining is so important that we do it with great focus and respect, and we get more resources because of that.
